issue.title: [CF 1219] [legion version] no sound
issue.body:
when i chose sound and press this icon - it's all ok. then when i press arrow "test notification" i have no sound. i already try all options with changing sound chanel in general options - media tab but nothing.


> Posted by CurseForge user ztn | Imported from CurseForge issue #1219 | Raw

comments.body:
